paper.title: Ice Core Sample Preparation
paper.description: Instructions of sample preparation technique to mount tephra particles extracted from ice cores. This technique was developed to ensure any size particle can be captured. Last update: June 16, 2017.

paper.description: Description of how to prepare and analyze fine-grained tephra particles (less than 20um) extracted from ice cores. Several analytical methods described are: EMP-WDS, SEM-EDS, LA-ICP-MS, and SIMS.
